: : SharpClaw : :
SharpClaw: Have you lost your mind? They'll surely have a vaccine or something. You'll just die in vain. And we need troops right now, we cant affords to lose any.
 raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@...> wrote:KitKat::

She looked at him. "Well, it involves me catching the plague, rubbing 
my insignia off and infecting the whole maximal base. They will 
simply rust away forever. Oh sure I'll be dead, but the PREDACONS 
will win the war once and for all."

there, so I thought I'd come talk to you. Explain this plan, 
destruction of Maximals is good, but what's the sacrifice.
